GPUWgslLanguageFeatures.summary:
The wgslLanguageFeatures read-only property of the
interface returns a object that reports the WGSL language extensions supported by the WebGPU implementation.

blockquote.para: Note: Not all WGSL language extensions are available to WebGPU in all browsers that support the API. We recommend you thoroughly test any extensions you choose to use.

GPUWgslLanguageFeatures.value: A object instance. This is a setlike object.
